pd.p:
Whether the watermark image is displayed in the local video preview:
: (Default) The watermark image is displayed in the preview.
: The watermark image is not displayed in the preview.

The area to display the watermark image in the landscape mode. See :
x: The horizontal offset from the top-left corner.
y: The vertical offset from the top-left corner.
width: The width (pixels) of the area.
height: The height (pixels) of the area.

The area to display the watermark image in the portrait mode. See :
x: The horizontal offset from the top-left corner.
y: The vertical offset from the top-left corner.
width: The width (pixels) of the area.
height: The height (pixels) of the area.
